attributes.action: Save our Parks/Recreation Grounds from being sold off
attributes.additional_details: Many outdoor leisure areas are under threat as hard-up councils sell them off for housing of large supermarkets or even the development of a link road to a supermarket.All often playing fields are victims of cmmercial and residential developments and we need to stop this now this to will make sure everyone can lead a healthly active lives. We need the Governmaent to make stronger law to stop the sale of play areas Recreation Ground, and open spaces
